name: cidashboard
description: Key Performance Indicator Visualizations Dashboard for Lumerical Inc.

scripts.setup: npm run setup-front && npm run setup-back
scripts.setup-front: cd react-app && npm install && cd .. && npm run build-front
scripts.setup-back: npm install && npm run build-back && npm run setup-db
scripts.build: npm run build-front && npm run build-back
scripts.build-front: node copyreactconfig && cd react-app && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.react: node copyreactconfig && npm run --prefix react-app start
scripts.dev: npm run build-back && npm run start

author: Johnny Lee, Elisa Chu, Tony So, Mike Zhou
